rukus.text: 33|59|Yogen-sha yo, anata no tsuma, musume-tachi mata shinja no on'na-tachi ni mo, ka no on'na-ra ni nagaginu o matou yo tsuge nasai. Sore de mitome rare yasuku, nayamasa renakute sumudearou. Arra wa kan'yo ni shite jihibukaku ara reru.

33|60|Moshi, nise shinja ya kokoro ni yamai no yadoru mono, soshite shichu no sendo-sha-tachi ga,(sono akuji o) tomenakereba, kare-ra ni taishi anata o, karitatete yarou. So sureba kono ato, kare-ra ga anata gata no rinjin to shite i rareru no mo, wazuka no madearou.
33|61|Kare-ra wa kanarazu norowa re, mitsukari shidai torae rare, korosarerudearou.
33|62|Kore wa mukashi no sugisatta-sha-tachi ni taisuru, arra no kankodearu. Arra no kanko ni wa nani no henko mo nai.
33|63|Hitobito wa (shinpan no)-ji ni tsuite anata ni tazuneyou. Itte yaru ga i. `Hontoni, sono chishiki wa, arra no omoto ni aru. Doshite anata ni wakarudarou ka, sonotoki wa chikaidearou.'
33|64|Hontoni arra wa fushin-sha ni gekido sa re, kare-ra no tame ni rekka o junbi nasa re,
33|65|kare-ra wa eien ni sono naka ni sumi, gadian mo kyujo-sha mo miidasenaidearou.
33|66|Sonohi, kare-ra no kao ga hi no naka de hikkurikaeri, kare-ra wa,`a , watashi-tachi wa arra ni shitagai, mata shito ni shitagaeba yokatta.' To iudarou.
33|67|Mata kare-ra wa iudarou. `Omo yo, watashi-tachi wa, hontoni atama ya kenryoku-sha-tachi ni shitagatte imashita. Kare-ra ga watashi-tachi o,-do ni mayowa seta nodesu.
33|68|Omo yo, kare-ra no chobatsu o 2-bai ni shite, hidoi gekido de kare-ra ni o okori kudasai.'
